fields.name: US - Review Request
fields.subject: Thank you for choosing Volutz!
fields.template:
Hi there!

My name is Rabih, I designed and engineered the Volutz product you received recently (thanks for the vote of confidence btw!)

I’m also the founder and CEO of Volutz. We embarked on a mission to challenge the wear & tear consumer tech industry to bring back craftsmanship spirit.

We strongly believe cheap downsized productions and generics for quick profits are resulting in marginalized and polluted communities.

A wear and tear product is not only a terrible idea on a personal-responsibility level but also for the survival of our planet.

We hope you have discovered how much we care for your complete satisfaction. If you for any reason are not 100% satisfied, we are here to move heaven & earth to put a smile back on your face.

Let us know {{LINK_CONTACT_SELLER}}

If you feel we delivered on our promise… Tell the world about us, the tiny Swedish brand called Volutz that challenged the industry and won you over! {{LINK_PRODUCT_REVIEW}}

Have a wonderful day,

Rabih AL Malla
Proud Founder & CEO of Volutz

we are available Mo-Fr 9am-4pm GMT+2

fields.name: US - Order Confirmation
fields.subject: Volutz order confirmation for your Amazon Order ID: [[ORDER_ID]]
fields.template:
Warm Greetings from Sweden!

My name is Frida. Thank you for choosing Volutz!

Great news! Your recent Volutz order dispatched earlier today and on its way to you! Expect to receive your order within the next 5-7 days (most likely sooner).

This is what you ordered: 

[[ITEM_TITLE_SHORT]]

We hope that you will discover that we engineer with sustainability in mind and soul, we believe this is exactly what the world needs. Your experience with Volutz means the world to us.

Should your Volutz experience be anything less than fantastic please reply to this email and tell us about how we can make it right - we promise to move heaven and earth to place a smile back on your face! 


I included an attachment in this email with contact and warranty information should you need it.
                                                                                                  
Have a wonderful day,

Frida

The Ago! Customer Care Team

Mo-Fr 9am-4pm GMT+1
[[LOGO_IMAGE]]
